articles.description: Latest Arsenal news includes fan reaction to Gabriel Magalhaes' performance in the 2-0 win over Wolves which came days after the Brazil World Cup squad announcement
articles.content:
Gabriel Magalhaes delivered the perfect response to his Brazil World Cup squad omission during Arsenal's 2-0 win over Wolves on Saturday night.
 Well, that is the view of many Gunners supporters who… [+3556 chars]

articles.author: Johnny Watterson
articles.title: Ireland v Fiji: Who put their hand up for next week against Australia? Hardly anyone - The Irish Times
articles.description: Low-wattage collective performance turned day into a successful if frustrating one for home team
articles.content: Fiji are as Fiji do and what Irish coach Andy Farrell has to ask himself is how many players from the team that won on Saturday in Dublin can squeeze into his matchday squad next Saturday against Aus… [+3192 chars]
